channel.title: Email on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Email on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription
item.description: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription Service Datatype Description SoftLayer customers can use this service to manage or view all of the available email subscriptions that they can suppress. Methods disable Disable email subscription. enable Enable email subscription. getAllObjects getEnabled getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Email_Subscription record.

item.title: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription_Group Service Datatype Description SoftLayer customers can use this service to view the parent groups of the email subscriptions Methods getAllObjects getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Email_Subscription_Group record. getSubscriptions Retrieve all email subscriptions associated with this group.

item.title: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription
item.description: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription Service Datatype Description Local description Brief description of the purpose of the email. Type: string id Type: integer name Email template name. Type: string Relational enabled Type: boolean Count

item.title: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription_Group
item.description: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription_Group Service Datatype Description Local id Type: integer name Email subscription group name. Type: string Relational subscriptions All email subscriptions associated with this group. Type: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription[] Count subscriptionCount A count of all email subscriptions associated with this group. Type: unsignedLong

item.title: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription_Suppression_User
item.description: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription_Suppression_User Datatype Description Local Relational subscription Type: SoftLayer_Email_Subscription Count
